rule_formulation.true: The subject of the sentence is female.
rule_formulation.false: The subject of the sentence is male.

true_samples: The woman walked down the street, holding a bouquet of flowers
Sheila, the talented pianist, delivered a breathtaking performance at the concert
Mary, the CEO of the company, announced a new initiative to promote gender equality in the workplace
Ingrid, the renowned chef, cooked a delicious five-course meal for her guests
As the sun set, Sarah, the photographer, captured the picturesque landscape in her camera
false_samples: John is running in the marathon
Peter ate a delicious pizza for dinner
The boy played with his toy car in the park
Tommy is the captain of the soccer team
Chris is studying for his biology exam
